name: Orca Survival Simulator
description:
Orca, also known as the Killer Whale, is one of the world's most fascinating and majestic animals. Now you control this gentle giant he tries to survive the wild ocean environment. Fight against, stingrays, octopus, sharks, seagulls, sea turtles, and dolphins. Attack everything the ocean throws your way. This high action Orca simulator is packed with adventure. The game has two goals: To search and rescue all four members of your great white family and to defeat all 5 giant enemy bosses. Survive against dolphin attacks, shark attacks, and even giant bird strikes. The better you get at hunting, the more meat points you will earn, and the faster you will upgrade. Search and explore all corners of the sea map to locate the other Orcas. When you need assistance, you can use the call button to call in the other members of your Killer Whale family.
Top Features:
--5 Enemy Bosses to defeat
--Rescue all 4 Members of your family
 --Huge Open World 3D Ocean Map with Beaches, Islands, Reefs, and Caves.
--Beautiful Tropical Beach terrain with 4 times of day plus changes in weather    
--Upgrade your Orca Stamina, Strength,, and Swim Speed.  
--Call upon your family for help to defeat the boss animals
--Great sound effects  

Hint : Go go for the easy fish to build up your meat points.
This animal simulator game has designed with all ages in mind. Don't forget to upgrade your whale!
Please check out Wildfoot's other free 3D animal sims. https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames
